name: Frida Boccara
description: '''Danielle Frida Hélène Boccara''' (29 October 1940 – 1 August 1996) was a French singer of Italian descent, who performed and recorded in a number of languages, including [[French language|French]], [[Spanish language|Spanish]], [[English language|English]], [[Italian language|Italian]], [[German language|German]], [[Dutch language|Dutch]] and [[Russian language|Russian]].
